description: External tools required for building and running binpress

xz-utils.description: XZ Utils provides liblzma compression library (for Linux ELF compression)
notes: liblzma is used for LZMA compression on Linux (ELF binaries)
On Linux: provides both liblzma.so (runtime) and lzma.h (build-time)
On macOS: LZFSE is used instead (built-in macOS compression framework)
On Windows: Windows Compression API is used (built-in)
